nodes.text: Outer Rim Expedition and Supply (or ORES) was a business at Black Spire Outpost on Batuu that outfitted and trained travelers in the region. A large electronic sign in the outpost advertised the company's services including private guides, survival training, blaster maintenance and language courses. The company was run by the Trandoshan merchant Kasif
The business was mentioned on an Aurebesh sign found in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which was one of many signs that could be translated with the Star Wars: Datapad app.
